ConverterSection.description: Convert HEIC to JPG for easier photo sharing and access across various devices.

howToConvert.title: How to convert a HEIC to JPG images
howToConvert.description: We made our file converter to be as easy to use as possible. Converting your HEIC to JPG involves three steps:

steps.description: Upload your HEIC: drag and drop your file into the area above to start the conversion.
Click ‘Convert to JPG’: This converts your file’s format from HEIC to JPG.

whyConvert.title: Why you may need to compress a MOV file
whyConvert.intro: Unfortunately, sending large video files online can be difficult due to upload limits from email, file sharing, or cloud storage services. By using Internxt to compress a MOV file, you get a secure, free tool that, once complete, allows you to:
bullets: Upload videos faster and save bandwidth
whyConvert.outro: All your files are encrypted during the upload and compression process to keep your videos private, so you can compress, store, and share your files in confidence with Internxt.

CtaSection.title: Tired of incompatible files?
CtaSection.description: Convert to the files you need with Internxt
